data.title: Last Chance Summer Sale: Up to 73% Off Pottery Barn & 69% Off West Elm
data.meta_description: Whether you’re looking for the perfect back-to-school items or refreshing your home decor with exclusive pieces from LoveShackFancy and Lilly Pulitzer, these limited-time offers are too good to miss.
data.text:
We independently selected these deals and products because we love them, and we think you might like them at these prices. E! has affiliate relationships, so we may get a commission if you purchase something through our links. Items are sold by the retailer, not E!. Prices are accurate as of publish time.

Can you believe it’s already August? With back-to-school season just around the corner and holiday festivities not far behind, it’s the perfect time to refresh your home before the busy months ahead. As we gear up for spooky season and pumpkin spice weather, there’s no better way to prep than by shopping for stylish home updates. And when it comes to finding unbeatable deals, beloved brands like Pottery Barn, Pottery Barn Teen, and West Elm have you covered with their limited-time summer sales.

Pottery Barn and Pottery Barn Teen are offering jaw-dropping discounts of up to 73% and 72% off, respectively, and both feature exclusive collab pieces from beloved brands like Lilly Pulitzer and LoveShackFancy in their sales. But, you’ll need to act fast — these incredible deals end today! West Elm, renowned for its chic and contemporary home decor, has just kicked off its summer sale with discounts up to 69% off. You’ve got a bit more time to shop this one, but don’t miss out on maximizing your savings — use promo code AUG20 at checkout.

Explore these fabulous offers now and transform your space with standout finds before these deals disappear!
